#include<stdio.h>
#define s(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define M 1000000007
typedef long long int ll;
ll f(ll a,ll b,ll c)
{

ll ans=1 ;                           
  while(b !=0 ) {
     
           if(b%2 == 1) {             
             ans = ans*a ; 
              ans = ans%c;      
           }
   a = a*a;                 
   a %= c;                   
   b /= 2;                
}
return ans;
}
int main()
{
	ll t;
	s(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll z,n; 
		s(n);
		z=f(2,n,M);
		//if(z>0)
		printf("%lld\n",z-1);
		//else
	}
	return 0;
}
